ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] how to do partial updates to resources

On Dec 23, 2007, at 6:19 PM, Julian Reschke wrote:

> <http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-dusseault-http-patch-10>, plus a  
> patch
> format suitable for updating XML.

I never understood why I'd need both a new verb (PATCH) and a new  
content type, as PUTting with some 'diff' content type is unambiguous.

Stefan
